CustomField.description: Select a layout for view response interface and survey result report page.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Choose the layout type for the preview interface and survey result report page:
Compact: Offers a condensed display, maximizing space utilization for a more efficient view. Comfy: Provides a more spacious and comfortable display, ensuring a user-friendly experience with ample spacing and padding around the elements.
CustomField.label: Response Layout Type
